EmailTemplate.description: SF RPA Integration Failure Notification for Retrigger
EmailTemplate.name: SF-RPA Failed Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Dispute Create Sync To RPA Failed For Queue:
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dispute Sync To RPA for Dispute Creation Failed
Dear Admins,
This is to notify the team that the Dispute create service Failed, Please use below table to copy in Excel and upload the dispute data in Queue: ##Queue
###TABLE
Warmest regards,
Salesforce Admin & Support
